name: fisti-fluffs Demo (Playfellow Studio)
description:
a physics based party game feat. racoons!

2 - 4 player competitive racoon tussling party game

prove your wobbly racoon is best racoon

note: this demo is multi-player only. while two players can play on the keyboard the game is designed to be played with controllers. 

fisti-fluffs

-a physics based game feat. racoons   -compete with friends in up to 4-player local play

-take screenshots in-game using the camera mode

-hats!

-whack, pounce and... hiss? your way to prove you are best trash bandit.

Make sure you have the latest DirectX drivers.

support on the playfellow patreon
